name: Debrandify ¬∑ Remove or Replace WordPress Branding
author: Tahoe Beetschen

sections.description:
Debrandify (formerly DeWordPressify) is a toolkit plugin that adds plenty of settings to customise and improve WordPress. You’ll be able to remove WordPress’ branding and replace it with your own as well as get rid of some of the bloat that comes built-in. Here’s the key features:

  • ‚ú® Customise the WordPress dashboard and emails with your own branding instead of WordPress’, remove or replace WordPress logos and texts
  • üóë Disable WordPress features such as comments, RSS feeds, emojis, REST API, WP Embeds and much more
  • üåê Fully compatible with Multisite (control network options and per-site options at the same time)
  • üåé Internationalised (available in French ü•ñ)
  • üëÄ High quality and lightweight with a solid user experience

Debrandify improves your WordPress experience by making it more minimal, cleaner and lighter.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Review/donate notice only appears to those who can manage plugins
  • Added some emojis and a link to Debrandify settings on the notice’s icon

1.1

  • Named was changed from DeWordPressify to be able to publish on the WordPress plugin platform
  • Added ability to remove the WordPress suffix at the end of tabs in the dashboard

short_description: Remove WordPress branding and replace it with your own thanks to Debrandify.
